author: abdel.stark
content: Yeah this is normal because I launched my tool right after the testnet start to generate 100 million accounts

author: abdel.stark
content: 2 billion gas blocks is the expected size of those blocks

author: tkstanczak
content: lol <@!574864862338088960> our GetHashCode on the Address object was taking the first 4 bytes...

author: tkstanczak
content: since the accounts in the test code are all created with 0x00000000 at the beginning

author: tkstanczak
content: they all had the same hash code and our Dictionaries all had O(n) searches which was causing our sync to take 600x more time than it should

author: tkstanczak
content: so we synced over 2 days what I can syn now in 2 minutes

author: tkstanczak
content: took me a while to investigate...

author: tkstanczak
content: so this could only really be caused by a test code that uses 2 billion gas ðŸ™‚
